description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow the extension of  time period for temporary classroom block to 31.08.2026, in relation to planning permission reference 201542FUL as amended planning permission 220097VAR by dated 03/01/2024 for 'Construction of three-storey infill extension, comprising additional classrooms, learning resource centre and associated hardstanding and electricity substation; construction of part single, part two-storey sports hall extension, with ancillary changing facilities; installation of detached two-storey temporary (two years) classroom structure; retrospective application to retain detached single-storey classroom structure for a temporary two-year period (departure application) (major application)'
